skills.name: ANGEL GRINDER
desc: • Deals 3 hits of true damage to a single target.
• Remove Invincibility and Vanish effects, before dealing damage.
• 25% Chance to Steal a Golden Effect each hit.
• Inflict Perfect Corruption and Silence for 1 turn.

skills.name: WILD ONE
desc: • Reduce Duration of Beneficial Effects on all enemies by 2.
• Inflict Crave, Blinding Burn, and Perfect Accuracy Down on each enemy for 2 turns.
• Grant a Random Offensive Effect to each ally.

skills.name: RENEGADE
desc: Remove a beneficial effect from each enemy everytime you take damage
